description:
The story of the original light novels and manga revolves around high school girl Eruna Ichinomiya, who enters the Mikagura Academy dreaming of a boarding school life filled with beauty. However, Eruna finds out that in the culture clubs, there is a rule that battles that are fought with special powers decide a club representative's treatment. Through various circumstances, Eruna becomes a representative of a club, and is thrown into the fray.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Boarding School
tags.description: Features characters attending a boarding school.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/saifu1low)

Masahiro Yokotani does series composition and scriptwriting.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

[Website](http://meganebanchow.com/) | [Blog](http://meganebanchow.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MeganeBanchow)

Also worked on the music for Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko as part of the unit Franz Maxwell I.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/saifu1low)

Masahiro Yokotani does series composition and scriptwriting.

Website | Blog | Portfolio | Anison __Kouta Kobayashi__, commonly known as Yashikin, is a Japanese lyricist, composer and orechestrator. He was born in Toshima-ku, Tokyo, Japan, and brought up in Ikebukuro. He is affiliated with F.M.F.

Initially worked as an animator in the '90s, but then left the industry and worked as a magazine editor at [Yuuichirou Oguro](https://anilist.co/staff/195642/)'s company. Made his return to anime in 2004. He wrote a few scripts in the early '00s, but has since shifted his focus to mainly storyboarding and directing episodes.

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@inumaroboya) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/5490)

Originally known for his indie animations on YouTube, he started out as an professional animator after passing the animator audition project called ABE48. This led him to make his debut in episode 37 of [Zettai Karen Children](https://anilist.co/anime/4038), directed by the two initiators of ABE48, [Hiroshi Ikehata](https://anilist.co/staff/120505) and [Akira Amemiya](https://anilist.co/staff/100956).

Noticed by [Takaya Sunagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/157903) on this same episode, he subsequently took part in several of [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047)'s works.
